name.title: Name of the resource that was registered

module.title: Module of the resource that was registered

is_directory.title: Describes whether the registered resource is a directory or not

is_missing.title: Describes whether the resource is missing on the system or not

size.title: Size of the resource expressed in bytes

items.title: Source of the resource defined with name and module properties

entries.title: List of sources for the resource defined with name and module properties

title: JSON schema for the embedded-resources.json that shows all resources that were registered.
